name: XEOMIN 50
treatmentDescriptions: Xeomin is indicated for the symptomatic treatment of blepharospasm, cervical dystonia of a predominantly rotational form (spasmodic torticollis) and of post-stroke spasticity of the upper limb presenting with flexed wrist and clenched fist in adult. Xeomin is indicated for the temporary improvement in the appearance of moderate to severe vertical lines between eyebrows seen at frown (glabellar frown lines) in adults below 65 years when the severity of these lines has an important psychological impact for the patient
ingredients: BOTULINUM TOXIN TYPE A 0.2 - 0.4 NG 50 LD50 UNITS / VIAL
